title: Corporate Website
description: Professional corporate website with CMS integration
longDescription: A modern corporate website featuring a custom WordPress theme, advanced CMS capabilities, multilingual support, and seamless integration with marketing automation tools.

contentBlocks.heading: Custom Theme Development
contentBlocks.content: We built a fully custom WordPress theme from scratch, designed to reflect GlobalTech's corporate identity while maintaining excellent performance and SEO optimization.

contentBlocks.heading: Enterprise Features
contentBlocks.content: The website includes advanced features like multilingual support for 8 languages, marketing automation integration, custom post types for case studies and team members, and a powerful careers portal.

challenges: Ensuring fast load times with rich media content
solutions: Modular design system with reusable components
Image optimization and lazy loading strategies
Custom navigation walker with mega menu support

testimonial.text: The new website has elevated our brand presence significantly. The CMS is intuitive and the multilingual capabilities are seamless.
testimonial.author: Patricia Martinez

sections.technologiesDesc: Leveraging modern tools and frameworks to build a robust solution
sections.resultsDesc: Measurable outcomes that demonstrate the success of the project

cta.title: Interested in Similar Results?
cta.description: Let's discuss how we can help bring your project to life with the same level of excellence
